Proposal To:
Ohio Department of Job and Family Services Ohio Parenting and Pregnancy Program Grant

Budget Narrative

Budget Narrative \\ (Page 2 of 2)

Budget Narrative

Please describe the costs and provide any necessary calculations for each budget line item. If indirect costs are included, the agency must provide a copy of their current approved indirect cost plan. Indirect costs will not be allowable without an appropriately approved indirect cost plan.

Personnel Detail:

Director - Family Health -Provides overall program supervision and interaction with involved organizations

Supervisor - Parenting -Responsible for scheduling programs and services as well as daily supervision
Case Management- Direct service provision and home visits
Care Coordinator/Liaison- Direct service provision
Family Life Educators - Fathers groups and STEPS sessions
Program Operations - Administrative support for the program
Fiscal Specialist- Fiscal support for program including reporting and invoicing
Marketing Support Development of promotional and educational materials
Program Outcome Manager-Evaluation and analysis
Fringe Benefits - these include FICA, Health, Dental, and Life Insurance, 401K employer contribution, 401k admin fees, and payroll processing fees. These expenses are budgeted at $22 \%$ of total base salaries.

Non - Personnel Detail:

Travel: Mileage reimbursement is for staff traveling from various service sites and home visits at a rate of $\$ .45$ per mile.

Office supplies/Materials: General office supplies and materials for groups and any printing needs.
Contract Services: Costs associated with background check for new employees
Participant Transportation: Bus tickets for participants to attend classes and sessions
Participant Support: Diapers for parents
Other - Food for clients: Meals during group sessions
Other - Incentives: Gift cards and baby supplies for participants
Other - Telephone: Case manager cell phone reimbursement at $\$ 20 /$ month
